text: “Enywe omukanda kwa Majini, nende Abandu, kooshibabeetselakhwo Abarumwa okhurula mwinywe babenoosinjia tsinyaali tsianje ne nibabekanyisilia omukhung’ano okwe inyanga yalelo?” Baliboola mbu; “khwilolele abeene khumibili chiefu” Ne obulamu bwokhushialo bwabakatia. Nenibelolela abeene mbu bali abakhayi
